meanings.definition: The outermost layer of the skin.
meanings.sent1: The epiderms protect our body from the sun's rays.
meanings.sent2: She applied lotion to her epiderms to keep them moisturized.
meanings.sent3: The epiderms on my nose turned red after too much sun exposure.
meanings.sent4: His epiderms felt like paper after spending hours in the pool.
meanings.sent5: The epiderms on his fingertips were rough from playing guitar.

meanings.definition: The epidermal tissue of a plant.
meanings.sent1: The epiderms of the leaf help in photosynthesis.
meanings.sent2: The gardener examined the epiderms of the plant for signs of disease.
meanings.sent3: The epiderms of the flower glistened in the morning dew.
meanings.sent4: The epiderms of the stem were strong and flexible.
meanings.sent5: The epiderms of the tree trunk were rough to the touch.
